Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/Lafyette
ShortDescription: Westbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, State, 83rd, Hollands and 87th: due to, police activity near 87th/Lafyette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, State, 83rd, Hollands, 87th and over regular route due to police activity near 87th/Lafyette.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing due to a utility problem near CTA property . Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing due to a utility problem near CTA property 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#22 Clark

#7 Harrison

#24 Wentworth

Shuttle buses have requested to provide connecting service between LaSalle and Western (Milwaukee) in both directions.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
